message.content:
cs.NE, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.CL

The paper proposes a novel neural network architecture for continuous learning, which is a common topic in the field of neural networks and machine learning. Therefore, cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the limitations of conventional learning algorithms, which suggests that it may belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) as well. The proposed architecture is inspired by the complementary learning system theory, which is related to cognitive science and psychology, indicating that it may also belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The experiments involve image classification, which suggests that it may belong to cs.CV (Computer Vision) or cs.CL (Computation and Language).
